mapper.insert: insert into `notification` (id, name, `type`, params, webhook_url, status, project_id, create_time, update_time) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{type}, #{params}, #{webhookUrl}, #{status}, #{projectId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE update_time = #{updateTime}, name = #{name}, `type` = #{type}, webhook_url = #{webhookUrl}, `status` = #{status}
mapper.update: update `notification` set status=#{status} where id != #{id} and project_id = #{projectId}
